| 2019 | 2018

 | £ million | £ million
Work in progress | 0.7 | 0.6
Finished goods¹ | 3.2 | 3.9
 | 3.9 | 4.5

paragraph 1: 8. Stocks
paragraph 2: Note
paragraph 3: 1. Finished goods in 2018 includes £2.2 million relating to deferred costs which has been reclassified from prepayments; see note 1 for further details.
paragraph 4: There were no stock write-downs recognised in the period (2018 nil) and there were no reversals of prior period stock write-downs (2018 nil).
paragraph 5: No stock is carried at fair value less costs to sell (2018 nil).
